About

Hello! My name is Saneeya (san-yah). I live in Southern California and have been doing design in various print and digital fields for over 10 years.

Some things I enjoy:

  • Puzzles & mysteries: from point-and-click games, escape rooms, to a whodunit page-turner
  • Learning things from podcasts & documentaries
  • DIY hobbies. I taught myself crocheting, baking and am now starting to learn quilling (a paper craft) and how to do my own manicures
  • Video games
